WTSS Spec
Continuous Integration with JenkinsInstallationPython Server for Web Time Series Service

Installation

wtss.py depends essentially on Requests. Please, read the instructions below in order to install wtss.py.

Production installation

Under Development!

Development installation

Clone the software repository:

$ git clone https://github.com/brazil-data-cube/wtss.py.git

Go to the source code folder:

$ cd wtss.py

Install in development mode:

$ pip3 install -e .[all]

Run the tests:

$ ./run-test.sh

Generate the documentation:

$ python setup.py build_sphinx

The above command will generate the documentation in HTML and it will place it under:

doc/sphinx/_build/html/
